column5: Got out solo this morning and fished a local area I've fished since I was a kid, put one good largie in the boat, I believe it was tickling 4 pounds!
That sure is a nice bass.  We have a triathlon going on here tomorrow, lots of athletes coming through the store, I was thinking this would be a picture of something else
What're you tryin' to say boy?... Is it Timmy???... Is Timmy in danger???... Did Timmy fall down the well???   Oh JHC!!!... Honey, Timmy fell down the dang well again!!!
Nice fish dax !!!! great pic as well,....  cheers
Nice Largie, Well done and thanks posting your pic.
Nice bass! I assume you caught it on a musky bait?
